actions: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
damage resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks
name: Grick
traits: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
